SELECT clt.CL_LotNo, clt.CL_ItemCode, pit.Product_Item_Name CL_ItemName, pit.Product_Info_STND_1 CL_STND_1, dt.Child_TBL_Type CL_Item_Clsfc_Name_1, dt2.Child_TBL_Type CL_Item_Clsfc_Name_2, dt3.Child_TBL_Type CL_Item_Material, eit.Equipment_Info_Name CL_EquipName, clt.CL_CrateCode, clt.CL_MachineCode, sum(clt.CL_Qty) CL_Qty, date(clt.CL_Create_Date) CL_Create_Date FROM Crate_Lot_tbl clt INNER JOIN Product_Info_tbl pit ON clt.CL_ItemCode = pit.Product_Item_Code INNER JOIN Equipment_Info_tbl eit ON clt.CL_MachineCode = eit.Equipment_Info_Code INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt ON pit.Product_Item_CLSFC_1 = dt.Child_TBL_No INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt2 ON pit.Product_Item_CLSFC_2 = dt2.Child_TBL_No INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt3 ON pit.Product_Material = dt3.Child_TBL_No WHERE clt.CL_MachineCode IS NOT NULL
AND clt.CL_Create_Date >= #{startDate} and clt.CL_Create_Date < #{endDate}
AND pit.Product_Item_Code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{ItemCode},'%')
GROUP BY clt.CL_LotNo WITH rollup

SELECT clt.CL_LotNo, clt.CL_ItemCode, pit.Product_Item_Name CL_ItemName, pit.Product_Info_STND_1 CL_STND_1, dt.Child_TBL_Type CL_Item_Clsfc_Name_1, dt2.Child_TBL_Type CL_Item_Clsfc_Name_2, dt3.Child_TBL_Type CL_Item_Material, eit.Equipment_Info_Name CL_EquipName, clt.CL_CrateCode, clt.CL_MachineCode, sum(clt.CL_Qty) CL_Qty, date(clt.CL_Create_Date) CL_Create_Date FROM Crate_Lot_tbl clt INNER JOIN Product_Info_tbl pit ON clt.CL_ItemCode = pit.Product_Item_Code INNER JOIN Equipment_Info_tbl eit ON clt.CL_MachineCode = eit.Equipment_Info_Code INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt ON pit.Product_Item_CLSFC_1 = dt.Child_TBL_No INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt2 ON pit.Product_Item_CLSFC_2 = dt2.Child_TBL_No INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt3 ON pit.Product_Material = dt3.Child_TBL_No WHERE clt.CL_MachineCode IS NOT NULL
AND clt.CL_Create_Date >= #{startDate} and clt.CL_Create_Date < #{endDate}
AND eit.Equipment_Info_Code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{MachineCode},'%')
GROUP BY clt.CL_LotNo WITH rollup

SELECT A.PRODUCTION_WorkOrder_No, A.PRODUCTION_WorkOrder_ONo, A.PRODUCTION_Product_Code, B.PRODUCT_ITEM_NAME PRODUCTION_Product_Name, A.PRODUCTION_Equipment_Code, C.EQUIPMENT_INFO_NAME PRODUCTION_Equipment_Name, sum(A.PRODUCTION_Volume) PRODUCTION_Volume, A.PRODUCTION_Date FROM ( select * from PRODUCTION_MGMT_TBL2 where PRODUCTION_Date >= #{startDate} and PRODUCTION_Date < #{endDate} and PRODUCTION_Product_Code like CONCAT('%', #{itemCode}, '%') ) A inner join ( select * from PRODUCT_INFO_TBL where PRODUCT_ITEM_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{itemCode}, '%') ) B on A.PRODUCTION_Product_Code = B.PRODUCT_ITEM_CODE inner join EQUIPMENT_INFO_TBL C on A.PRODUCTION_Equipment_Code = C.EQUIPMENT_INFO_CODE group by A.PRODUCTION_Product_Code, A.PRODUCTION_WorkOrder_No with rollUp

SELECT A.PRODUCTION_WorkOrder_No, A.PRODUCTION_WorkOrder_ONo, A.PRODUCTION_Product_Code, B.PRODUCT_ITEM_NAME PRODUCTION_Product_Name, A.PRODUCTION_Equipment_Code, C.EQUIPMENT_INFO_NAME PRODUCTION_Equipment_Name, sum(A.PRODUCTION_Volume) PRODUCTION_Volume, A.PRODUCTION_Date FROM ( select * from PRODUCTION_MGMT_TBL2 where PRODUCTION_Date >= #{startDate} and PRODUCTION_Date < #{endDate} and PRODUCTION_Equipment_Code like CONCAT('%', #{machineCode}, '%') ) A inner join PRODUCT_INFO_TBL B on A.PRODUCTION_Product_Code = B.PRODUCT_ITEM_CODE inner join ( select * from EQUIPMENT_INFO_TBL where EQUIPMENT_INFO_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{machineCode}, '%') ) C on A.PRODUCTION_Equipment_Code = C.EQUIPMENT_INFO_CODE group by A.PRODUCTION_Equipment_Code, A.PRODUCTION_WorkOrder_No with rollUp

SELECT clt.CL_LotNo LI_LotNo, clt.CL_ItemCode LI_ItemCode, clt.CL_Qty LI_Qty, clt.CL_Create_Date LI_Create_Date, pit.Product_Item_Name LI_ItemName, pit.Product_Info_STND_1 LI_Item_STND_1, dt.Child_TBL_Type LI_Item_Material, dt2.Child_TBL_Type LI_Item_Clsfc_1, dt3.Child_TBL_Type LI_Item_Clsfc_2 FROM Crate_Lot_tbl clt INNER JOIN Product_Info_tbl pit ON clt.CL_ItemCode = pit.Product_Item_Code
SELECT lmt.LM_LotNo LI_LotNo, lmt.LM_ItemCode LI_ItemCode, lmt.LM_Qty LI_Qty, lmt.LM_Create_Date LI_Create_Date, pit.Product_Item_Name LI_ItemName, pit.Product_Info_STND_1 LI_Item_STND_1, dt.Child_TBL_Type LI_Item_Material, dt2.Child_TBL_Type LI_Item_Clsfc_1, dt3.Child_TBL_Type LI_Item_Clsfc_2, dt4.Child_TBL_Type LI_Status FROM LotMaster_tbl lmt INNER JOIN Product_Info_tbl pit ON lmt.LM_ItemCode = pit.Product_Item_Code
INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt ON pit.Product_Material = dt.Child_TBL_No INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt2 ON pit.Product_Item_CLSFC_1 = dt2.Child_TBL_No INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt3 ON pit.Product_Item_CLSFC_2 = dt3.Child_TBL_No
WHERE clt.CL_Create_Date >= #{startDate} and clt.CL_Create_Date < #{endDate}
AND clt.CL_LotNo LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{LotNo},'%')
AND clt.CL_ItemCode LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{ItemCode},'%')
INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt4 ON lmt.LM_Warehouse = dt4.Child_TBL_No WHERE lmt.LM_Create_Date >= #{startDate} and lmt.LM_Create_Date < #{endDate} AND lmt.LM_LotNo LIKE CONCAT('S','%')
AND lmt.LM_LotNo LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{LotNo},'%')
AND lmt.LM_ItemCode LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{ItemCode},'%')
INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt4 ON lmt.LM_Warehouse = dt4.Child_TBL_No WHERE lmt.LM_Create_Date >= #{startDate} and lmt.LM_Create_Date < #{endDate} AND lmt.LM_LotNo LIKE CONCAT('L','%')
AND lmt.LM_LotNo LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{LotNo},'%')
AND lmt.LM_ItemCode LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{ItemCode},'%')
